album.name: Vintage Car Rally
album.description: Today was the London to Brighton vintage car rally, and as we didn't have anything better to do we thought we'd take a look. The participants were pretty lucky as the day was mostly fine.

image.caption: Queueing to get past the finish post
image.description: I'm not sure how much of a race as such this was. There were a couple of guys commentating and they were talking to some of the drivers of the more interesting cars as they came over the finish line. If there were a few "interesting" cars in a row then the queues built up.

image.caption: It's all done with steam
image.description: Some of the cars looked to be getting a bit overheated by the time they arrived in Brighton

image.caption: A cute dog amongst the spectators
A smart yellow car
image.description: I know nothing about the cars that were running, but I just took a few photos of the more interesting ones

image.caption: That's a bike.... isn't it?
image.description: You wouldn't catch me sitting in that wicker seat at the front of the bike. I wonder how the driver gets to see the road ahead.
